scripts.build:all: pnpm build:cloudinary && pnpm build:pages && pnpm build:seo && pnpm build:geocoding
scripts.publish:all: pnpm publish:cloudinary && pnpm publish:pages && pnpm publish:seo && pnpm publish:geocoding
scripts.format:all: pnpm format:cloudinary && pnpm format:geocoding && pnpm format:pages && pnpm format:seo
